They're everywhere, you know. Hiding in plain sight.  They infiltrate our media, our schools, our governments.  You can't trust anything you see or hear anymore. I used to think it was just the news, all that talk about "tolerance" and "diversity".  But it goes so much deeper than that.  

I get my information from people who see through the lies, the REAL patriots.  There are websites, forums, hidden corners of the internet where we share what we've uncovered.  Books too, old ones, before they were all rewritten to fit their narrative.  And sometimes, just sometimes, you see it in the way they look at you, the way they talk, the little things they say. It's all there, if you know where to look.

It's crucial to approach conspiracy theories with a healthy dose of skepticism and critical thinking.
